page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: Transport is important to small villages like ours. Most people travel by car, some families having two cars where father needs his for travelling to work. There is a school bus every day to take the children to and from their Secondary Schools in Grantham. There is also a works bus each day. On Saturday, Wednesday and Friday there are buses to Newark and Grantham to take people shopping. Some children cycle to school from Hougham. The main London to Edinburgh passes through the villages but now no longer stops here.
